symptoms: Patient reports stable blood glucose levels, occasional morning hyperglycemia
treatment: Continue current Metformin regimen, dietary counseling reinforced
followUp: Return in 3 months for A1C check, sooner if glucose levels become unstable

chiefComplaint: Asthma management and inhaler technique review
symptoms: Mild shortness of breath with exercise, no recent exacerbations
treatment: Reviewed proper inhaler technique, prescribed peak flow meter
followUp: Return in 6 weeks or sooner if symptoms worsen

chiefComplaint: Chest pain and shortness of breath
symptoms: Intermittent chest tightness, mild shortness of breath on exertion
diagnosis: Stable angina, rule out cardiac event
treatment: EKG performed - normal, ordered stress test, increased clopidogrel
followUp: Stress test next week, return immediately if chest pain worsens

chiefComplaint: Anxiety levels increased, medication side effects
symptoms: Increased worry, mild nausea from current medication
treatment: Reduced Sertraline to 25mg daily, recommended therapy referral
followUp: Return in 2 weeks to assess medication adjustment

symptoms: Burning sensation after meals, disrupted sleep due to reflux
treatment: Increased Omeprazole to twice daily, dietary modifications discussed
followUp: Return in 4 weeks, consider endoscopy if no improvement

symptoms: Improved energy levels, less shortness of breath
diagnosis: Iron deficiency anemia - responding to treatment
treatment: Continue iron supplementation, ordered repeat CBC
followUp: Lab results review in 1 week, continue iron for 3 more months

symptoms: Persistent lower back pain, radiating to left leg
diagnosis: Chronic lumbar strain with possible sciatica
treatment: Physical therapy referral, continued NSAIDs, lumbar support recommended
followUp: Return in 6 weeks after PT evaluation, sooner if pain worsens

symptoms: Reduced migraine frequency from 3-4 per week to 1-2 per week
treatment: Continue current Sumatriptan regimen, added magnesium supplement
followUp: Return in 8 weeks, keep headache diary
